title: Solution Resource schema
description: This object represents a flight departing from a given departure airport not earlier than the specified departure datetime and arriving to a given arrival airport not later than the specified arrival datetime

datetime.description: Any type of date. ISO 8601 datetime

leg.description: A single leg that a flight is composed of

departureDateTime.description: A departure datetime in the departure airport timezone in ISO 8601 format

arrivalDateTime.description: An arrival datetime in the arrival airport timezone in ISO 8601 format

legs.title: List of legs that a flight is composed of
